009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.mod;
012import static java.lang.Math.PI;
013
014import java.util.Random;
015
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
018
019public class EllipseSampler {
020        
021        private final Random rg;
022        
023        private final GeometricEllipse ellipse;
024        
025        public EllipseSampler(GeometricEllipse ellipse) {
026                this.ellipse = ellipse;
027                this.rg = new Random();
028        }
029        
030        public EllipseSampler(GeometricEllipse ellipse, long seed) {
031                this.ellipse = ellipse;
032                this.rg = new Random(seed);
033        }
034        
035        /**
036         * Create an array of (x,y) coordinates on an ellipse of radii (a,b) and
037         * rotated r radians. Random noise is added if noise &gt; 0.
038         * @param n number of points
039         * @param startAngle initial angle (radians)
040         * @param arcAngle arc angle (radians)
041         * @param sigma amount of random noise
042         * @return an array of sample points
043         */
044        public Pnt2d[] getPoints(int n, double startAngle, double arcAngle, double sigma) {
045                Pnt2d[] points = new Pnt2d[n];
046                                
047                double xc = ellipse.xc;
048                double yc = ellipse.yc;
049                double ra = ellipse.ra;
050                double rb = ellipse.rb;
051                double theta = ellipse.theta;
052                
053                startAngle = mod(startAngle, 2 * PI);   
054                arcAngle   = mod(arcAngle, 2 * PI);
055                if (arcAngle == 0)
056                        arcAngle = 2 * PI;
057
058                
059//              double dAngle;
060//              if (endAngle > startAngle) {
061//                      dAngle = endAngle - startAngle;
062//              }
063//              else if (endAngle < startAngle) {
064//                      dAngle = endAngle + 2 * PI - startAngle;
065//              }
066//              else {  // endAngle == startAngle
067//                      dAngle = 2 * PI;
068//              }
069
070                final double cosTh = Math.cos(theta);
071                final double sinTh = Math.sin(theta);
072                
073                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
074                        double alpha = startAngle + arcAngle * i / n;
075                        double x0 = ra * Math.cos(alpha) + sigma * rg.nextGaussian();
076                        double y0 = rb * Math.sin(alpha) + sigma * rg.nextGaussian();
077                        double x = x0 * cosTh - y0 * sinTh + xc;
078                        double y = x0 * sinTh + y0 * cosTh + yc;
079                        points[i] = Pnt2d.from(x, y);
080                }
081                return points;
082        }
083
084}
